client.communication

Class ServerPoller

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.communication.ServerPoller

  • public class ServerPoller
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Doug The ServerPoller calls the server to find out if there have been any changes made to the game so the user's model can be updated.
